thread.title: William Schall
thread.title_full: Preferred Patron Customer Loyalty reviewed by William Schall

author: William Schall
title: William Schall
text: We use it at our senior living facility cafe to manage guest spending accounts. The program works well and reporting is exceptional. Our guests find it very convenient. Support us always quick to respond when we have questions.
